generated_body: If you click on the article titled "George Conway and Trump Jr. trade personal insults during impeachment hearing," you might expect a detailed account of the exchanges between George Conway, a prominent critic of Donald Trump, and Trump Jr. during a recent impeachment hearing. The article is likely to provide context on the political implications of their insults, explore the motivations behind their public feud, and analyze how this interaction reflects broader tensions within the Republican Party. It may also include commentary from political analysts on the significance of their remarks in the current political landscape.
